Title: The Internet Learning Agent
Body: Date: Tue, 10 Dec 1996 03:33:24 GMT Server: NCSA/1.4.2 Content-type: text/html Last-modified: Thu, 07 Nov 1996 18:50:55 GMT Content-length: 1218 The Internet Learning Agent The Internet Learning Agent (ILA) The number and diversity of information resources on the net is growing rapidly.
